metadata.dc:author: Alvarez García, A
Arnal Monreal, F
Lorenzo Patiño, M J
metadata.dc:description: We report two cases of osseous metaplasia in the polypoid areas of colorectal carcinomas. This is an extremely rare condition with no more than 30 cases published, that has to be recognized to avoid misinterpretations on biopsies or surgical specimens. The pathogenesis is unknown and it does not change the biological behaviour of these tumors.
metadata.dc:title: Metaplasia ósea en carcinoma colorectal.
[Bone metaplasia in colorectal carcinoma].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
